doc.description:
Image Class


This class is used to upload, delete and transform images, and create thumbnails.

tags.author: Thomas Nabet <thomas.nabet@gmail.com>
tags.todo: Add a static function and var to check for available libraries (Imagick/GD)

name: bbn\File\Image

removeAlphaImagick.name: removeAlphaImagick
removeAlphaImagick.summary: Removes the alpha channel from an image (Imagick)

doc.description: Removes the alpha channel from an image (Imagick)

removeAlphaImagick.comments:
/**
   * Removes the alpha channel from an image (Imagick)
   *
   * @param \Imagick $img The Imagick object
   * @return \Imagick
   */

jpg2pdf.name: jpg2pdf
jpg2pdf.summary: Converts one or more jpg image(s) to a pdf file. If the pdf file doesn't exist will be created.

arguments.name: jpg
arguments.description: The path of jpg file(s) to convert

arguments.name: pdf
arguments.description: The path of the pdf file

params.name: $jpg
params.description: The path of jpg file(s) to convert

params.name: $pdf
params.description: The path of the pdf file

jpg2pdf.comments:
/**
   * Converts one or more jpg image(s) to a pdf file. If the pdf file doesn't exist will be created.
   *
   * ```php
   * bbn\X::dump(bbn\File\Image::jpg2pdf(["/home/data/test/two.jpg","/home/data/test/one.jpeg"], "/home/data/test/doc.pdf"));
   * // (string) "/home/data/test/doc.pdf"
   * ```
   *
   * @param array  $jpg The path of jpg file(s) to convert
   * @param string $pdf The path of the pdf file
   * @return string|false
   */

pdf2jpg.name: pdf2jpg
pdf2jpg.summary: Converts pdf file to jpg image(s).

arguments.name: pdf
arguments.description: The path of pdf file to convert

arguments.name: jpg
arguments.description: The destination filename. If empty is used the same path of pdf. Default: empty.

arguments.name: num
arguments.description: The index page of pdf file to convert. If set 'all' all pages to convert. Default: 0(first page).

params.name: $pdf
params.description: The path of pdf file to convert

params.name: $jpg
params.description: The destination filename. If empty is used the same path of pdf. Default: empty.

params.name: $num
params.description: The index page of pdf file to convert. If set 'all' all pages to convert. Default: 0(first page).

pdf2jpg.comments:
/**
   * Converts pdf file to jpg image(s).
   *
     * ```php
     * bbn\X::dump(bbn\File\Image::pdf2jpg("/home/data/test/doc.pdf"));
     * // (string)  "/home/data/test/doc.jpg"
     * bbn\X::dump(bbn\File\Image::pdf2jpg("/home/data/test/doc.pdf",'', all));
     * // (array) ["/home/data/test/doc-0.jpg","/home/data/test/doc-1.jpg"]
     * bbn\X::dump(bbn\File\Image::pdf2jpg("/home/data/test/doc.pdf",'/home/data/test/Folder/image.jpg', all));
   * // (array) ["/home/data/test/Folder/image-0.jpg", "/home/data/test/Folder/image-1.jpg"],
     * ```
   *
   * @param string $pdf The path of pdf file to convert
   * @param string $jpg The destination filename. If empty is used the same path of pdf. Default: empty.
   * @param int    $num The index page of pdf file to convert. If set 'all' all pages to convert. Default: 0(first page).
   * @return string|array
   */

svg2png.name: svg2png

setImageClassMode.name: setImageClassMode

isImagick.name: isImagick
isImagick.summary: Returns true if the current library used is Imagick

__construct.name: __construct

parent.name: __construct

doc.description:
Constructor.

```php
$file=new bbn\File('/home/user/Desktop/test.txt');
```
Construct

__toString.name: __toString

getExtension.name: getExtension
getExtension.summary: Returns the extension of the image. If the file has jpg extension will return 'jpeg'.

parent.name: getExtension
parent.summary: Return the extension of the file.
parent.comments:
/**
   * Return the extension of the file.
   *
   * ```php
   * $file = new File('C:/Test/file.txt');
   * X::dump($file->getExtension());
   * //(string) 'txt'
   * ```
   *
   * @return string|false
   */

getExtension.comments:
/**
   * Returns the extension of the image. If the file has jpg extension will return 'jpeg'.
   *
     * ```php
   * $img = new bbn\File\Image("/home/data/test/image.jpg");
   * bbn\X::dump($img->getExtension());
     * // (string) "jpeg"
   * ```
   *
     * @return string
     */

test.summary: Tests if the object is a image.

display.name: display

save.name: save
save.summary: Save the image in a new destination if given or overwrite the file (default).

parent.name: save
parent.summary: That feature saves the file as a parameter, and accepts a string that contains the path where to save.

doc.description:
That feature saves the file as a parameter, and accepts a string that contains the path where to save.

```php
 $file->save('/home/user/desktop/');
```

parent.comments:
/**
   * That feature saves the file as a parameter, and accepts a string that contains the path where to save.
   *
   * ```php
   *  $file->save('/home/user/desktop/');
   * ```
   *
   * @param string $dest
   * @return file
   */

arguments.name: dest
arguments.description: The destination of the file to save. Default = false, the file will overwrited.

params.name: $dest
params.description: The destination of the file to save. Default = false, the file will overwrited.

getWidth.name: getWidth
getWidth.summary: If the file is an image will return its width in pixel.
getWidth.comments:
/**
   * If the file is an image will return its width in pixel.
   *
     * ```php
     * $img = new bbn\File\Image("/home/data/test/image.jpg");
     * bbn\X::dump($img->getWidth());
     * // (int) 265
   * ```
   *
     * @return int | false
     */

getHeight.name: getHeight
getHeight.summary: If the file is an image will return its height in pixel.
getHeight.comments:
/**
   * If the file is an image will return its height in pixel.
   *
     * ```php
     * $img = new bbn\File\Image("/home/data/test/image.jpg");
     * bbn\X::dump($img->getHeight());
     * // (int) 190
   * ```
   *
     * @return int|false
     */

resize.name: resize
resize.summary: Resize the width and the height of the image. If is given only width or height the other dimension will be set on auto.

arguments.name: crop
arguments.description: If cropping the image. Default = false.

arguments.name: max_w
arguments.description: w The maximum value for new width.

arguments.name: max_h
arguments.description: h The maximum valure for new height.

doc.description: Resize the width and the height of the image. If is given only width or height the other dimension will be set on auto.

params.name: $crop
params.description: If cropping the image. Default = false.

params.name: $max
params.description: w The maximum value for new width.

params.name: $max
params.description: h The maximum valure for new height.

autoresize.name: autoresize
autoresize.summary: Resize the image with constant values, if the width is not given it will be set to auto.

doc.description: Resize the image with constant values, if the width is not given it will be set to auto.

autoresize.comments:
/**
   * Resize the image with constant values, if the width is not given it will be set to auto.
   * @todo BBN_MAX_WIDTH and BBN_MAX_HEIGHT ?
   *
   * ```php
   * $img = new bbn\File\Image("/home/data/test/image.jpg");
   * bbn\X::dump($img->getWidth(),$img->getHeight());
   * // (int) 345  146
   * $img->autoresize("", 100);
   * bbn\X::dump($img->getWidth(),$img->getHeight());
   * // (int) 236  100
   * ```
   *
   * @param integer $w default  BBN_MAX_WIDTH
   * @param integer $h default BBN_MAX_HEIGHT
   * @return image
   */

crop.name: crop
crop.summary: Returns a crop of the image.

rotate.name: rotate
rotate.comments:
/**
   * Rotates the image.
   *_
   * ```php
   * $img = new bbn\File\Image("/home/data/test/image.jpg");
   * $img->rotate( 90 )->save();
   * ```
   *
   * @param integer $angle The angle of rotation.
   * @return image
     */

flip.name: flip

quality.name: quality
quality.summary: Compresses and sets the image's quality (JPEG image only).
quality.comments:
/**
   * Compresses and sets the image's quality (JPEG image only).
   *
     * ```php
   * $img = new bbn\File\Image("/home/data/test/image.jpg");
   * $img->quality(60, 6)->save();
   * ```
     *
   * @param int $q    The quality level (0-100)
   * @param int $comp The compression type
   * @return image
   */

brightness.name: brightness

arguments.name: val
arguments.description: The value "+" (default) increases the brightness, the value ("-") reduces it.

params.name: $val
params.description: The value "+" (default) increases the brightness, the value ("-") reduces it.

contrast.name: contrast

arguments.name: val
arguments.description: The value "+" (default), increases the contrast, the value ("-") reduces it.

params.name: $val
params.description: The value "+" (default), increases the contrast, the value ("-") reduces it.

grayscale.name: grayscale
grayscale.summary: Converts the image's color to grayscale.

negate.name: negate
negate.summary: Converts the image's color to negative.

polaroid.name: polaroid
polaroid.summary: Converts the image's color with polaroid filter.
polaroid.comments:
/**
   * Converts the image's color with polaroid filter.
   *
   * ```php
   * $img = new bbn\File\Image("/home/data/test/image.jpg");
   * $img->polaroid()->save();
   * ```
   *
     * @return image
   * @todo Transparency of png files.
     */

thumbs.name: thumbs

toString.name: toString
toString.comments:
/**
   * Return the image as string.
   *
     * ```php

   * bbn\X::hdump($img->toString());
   * // (string)
     * ```
   *
     * @return string
     */

download.name: download
download.summary: Downloads the file. At the end of the script the user will be invited to choose the file's destination. If the file doesn't exist return an object with parameter file = null.

parent.name: download
parent.summary: Downloads the file. At the end of the script the user will be invited to choose the file's destination. If the file doesn't exist return an object with parameter file = null.

dummyComments:
/**
 * Image Class
 *
 *
 * This class is used to upload, delete and transform images, and create thumbnails.
 *
 * @author Thomas Nabet <thomas.nabet@gmail.com>
 * @copyright BBN Solutions
 * @since Apr 4, 2011, 23:23:55 +0000
 * @category Files ressources
 * @license http://www.opensource.org/licenses/lgpl-license.php LGPL
 * @version 0.2r89
 * @package bbn\File
 * @todo Deal specifically with SVG
 * @todo Add a static function and var to check for available libraries (Imagick/GD)
 */
description: This class is used to upload, delete and transform images, and create thumbnails.

description_parts.content: This class is used to upload, delete and transform images, and create thumbnails.
